minority_owned_business_create_job.long_description: Count of businesses creating new jobs as minority-owned. A minority-owned business is a U.S. business that is at least 51% owned by, and whose management and daily business operations are controlled by, one or more members of a socially and economically disadvantaged minority group, namely U.S. citizens who are African Americans (Black), Hispanic Americans, Native Americans, Asian-Pacific Americans and Sub-Continent Asian Americans. Available for US businesses.
minority_owned_business_create_job.long_name: Count of businesses creating new jobs as minority-owned
minority_owned_business_create_job.short_description: Count of businesses creating new jobs as minority-owned

non_minority_owned_business_create_job.long_description: Count of businesses creating new jobs as non-minority-owned. A non-minority-owned business is a U.S. business that is at least 51% owned by, and whose management and daily business operations are controlled by, one or more members not of a socially and economically disadvantaged minority group, namely U.S. citizens who are African Americans (Black), Hispanic Americans, Native Americans, Asian-Pacific Americans and Sub-Continent Asian Americans. Available for US businesses.
non_minority_owned_business_create_job.long_name: Count of businesses creating new jobs as non-minority-owned
non_minority_owned_business_create_job.short_description: Count of businesses creating new jobs as non-minority-owned

minority_owned_job_creation_active.long_description: Count of new jobs created by active businesses (an active business is a company that exist last year) as minority-owned. A minority-owned business is a U.S. business that is at least 51% owned by, and whose management and daily business operations are controlled by, one or more members of a socially and economically disadvantaged minority group, namely U.S. citizens who are African Americans (Black), Hispanic Americans, Native Americans, Asian-Pacific Americans and Sub-Continent Asian Americans. minority_owned_job_creation_active.statement: {value} new jobs have been created by active businesses in {region_name}.

Available for US businesses.
